name: 曹筱玥
objective:
課程規劃的目標為以互動設計的理論為基礎，實務導向為原則，使學習者能將學術界的理論與產業界的實務加以結合以充實對於互動設計具有的了解。學習的內容包含互動設計系統構成要素、實務與理論基礎、方法與技術、科技支援與應用等單元，各單元並包含不同互動設計個案的研討，使理論能與實務進行驗證。課程亦安排至相關領域業界的參訪以及互動相關展覽參觀，以加深對於互動設計實務的印象與了解。
The course aims to develop broad understanding on interaction design for students, based on theory and practice course structure. Course topics include essential factors of interactive system, interaction design theory and practice, methods and techniques, technical support and application. Course also incorporates case studies, company visits and exhibitions relevant to interaction design to enhance the understanding of integrating theory and practice.
schedule:
Professor Huang teaches this course from the first week to the ninth week (till Midterm)
Week 1 Course Introduction 
Week 2 Key Principles of Interactive Design - User Experience_1
Week 3 Key Principles of Interactive Design - User Experience_2
Week 4 Interactive Design vs. Human-Machine Interface - 
             Dialogue with Computers
Week 5 Human Factors Basis of Human-Machine Interface
Week 6 Human-Machine Interface Usability
Week 7 User Interface Design & User Experience Design
Week 8 Interactive Advertising and Marketing
Week 9 Midterm Presentation

Professor Tsao teaches this course from the tenth week to the eighteenth week
Week 10. Course introduction 
Week 11. Visit Mockup COMPANY 
Week 12. Visit Interactive Exhibition 
Week 13. Visit VR COMPANY
Week 14 Visit AI COMPANY 
Week 15 Visit Vtuber COMPANY
Week 16 Visit AR Robot COMPANY  
Week 17 Presentation 
Week 18 Course summary and report submission
scorePolicy:

Midterm Exam: 30% 
Final Exam: 40%
